interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BH DERMCENTER Glycolic Acid Resurfacing Serum - Brightens and Clarifies Skin 1 oz
Review Date: 2020/08/29
Store: BH DERMCENTER
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All Skin,All Skin Types', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'BH DERMCENTER', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 1 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BHDGLYSER', 'UPC': '850004068144'}
Review Text: This is an interesting product as I have not tried a glycolic serum before this.  This product has a very slight scent that is barely noticeable. It comes in an amber glass bottle with a dropper.  This serum has kind of a toning effect on my skin.  I am applying a thin layer followed by a moisturizer and can’t believe how after just one week my skin feels noticeably smoother, much more than if I had just used the moisturizer alone.  And my face definitely looks brighter.  Last but not least, I didn’t have to use very much because it spreads well, and a little goes a long way.
Review Title: Tones and smooths
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz Higher Education {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'} This is one of the most refreshing moisturizers I have tried, and I really like this one a lot! It is very creamy and pale green in color, goes on smooth, and has a wonderful cucumber smell, but is much more subtle and not overpowering. I have very dry skin, so am very happy that this moisturizer applies easily and absorbs into the skin very well. It definitely makes dry skin look more alive. Definitely a 5 star moisturizer! Wonderful cucumber scent Blue Sage De-Puffing Caffeine Eye Serum | Natural Anti-Aging Eye Treatment with Probiotics, Green Tea + Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Face to Tighten and Hydrate under Eye Skin, and Brighten Dark Circles Blue Sage {'Package Dimensions': '6.06 x 1.65 x 1.42 inches; 4.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004070450', 'Manufacturer': 'Blue Sage Skin Co'} The product itself works okay around my eyes as the listing stated it would and helps my under eye area look noticeably better. It blends easily into the skin, and I did not need to use very much. I like that you can also use it on your entire face if needed. I tried that also, and found that while it brightens my face a bit, I do still need to apply a moisturizer over it to get proper hydration for my dry skin. This serum has a very subtle, barely noticeable scent which is pleasant.

Sadly, the pump dispenser on the bottle I received does not work at all. It does turn to lock and unlock, but no matter what I did the pump did not work. So in order for me to use it I have to unscrew the cap every time, pull the pump tube out, and wipe some product from the pump tube. This serum is very thick and more like a gel, so it is way too thick to tilt the bottle and expect a drop to come out. The defective dispenser pump was a disappointment. Serum works but pump doesn’t BH DERMCENTER Glycolic Acid Resurfacing Serum - Brightens and Clarifies Skin 1 oz BH DERMCENTER {'Skin Type': 'All Skin,All Skin Types', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'BH DERMCENTER', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 1 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BHDGLYSER', 'UPC': '850004068144'} This is an interesting product as I have not tried a glycolic serum before this. This product has a very slight scent that is barely noticeable. It comes in an amber glass bottle with a dropper. This serum has kind of a toning effect on my skin. I am applying a thin layer followed by a moisturizer and can’t believe how after just one week my skin feels noticeably smoother, much more than if I had just used the moisturizer alone. And my face definitely looks brighter. Last but not least, I didn’t have to use very much because it spreads well, and a little goes a long way. Tones and smooths
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Type:** Prefers products suitable for dry and sensitive skin.
- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys creamy moisturizers and serums that are refreshing and hydrating, with a growing interest in exfoliating and brightening products. Recent interactions highlight a preference for eye products with multifunctional uses, alongside effective serums that enhance skin texture and tone.
- **Scent Preference:** Appreciates subtle, refreshing scents—particularly aloe and cucumber—but remains open to very subtle fragrances that are pleasant and not overpowering.
- **Application Experience:** Values smooth application, good absorption, and ease of use. Recent experiences emphasize the importance of functional packaging, such as dispensers that facilitate product use.
- **Quality Expectations:** Expects high-quality products with visible results, reflected in consistently high ratings given to products. The effectiveness of product functionality has recently influenced overall satisfaction levels.
- **Brand Affinity:** Favors brands committed to skin health, natural ingredients, and effective formulations, with an increased attention to usability features that enhance the application experience.

Overall, the user seeks multifunctional moisturizers and serums that deliver significant hydration, improve skin texture, and provide a satisfactory sensory experience, while emphasizing both effectiveness and functional packaging design.
